comment: Smart Data Models - GovHydroWPID adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/GovHydroWPID/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Woodward PID Hydro Governor.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: d
contents.comment: Turbine damping factor (D).  Unit = delta P / delta speed. Default: 0.0

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: gatmax
contents.comment: Gate opening Limit Maximum (Gatmax). Default: 0.0

contents.name: gatmin
contents.comment: Gate opening Limit Minimum (Gatmin). Default: 0.0

contents.name: gv1
contents.comment: Gate position 1 (Gv1). Default: 0.0

contents.name: gv2
contents.comment: Gate position 2 (Gv2). Default: 0.0

contents.name: gv3
contents.comment: Gate position 3 (Gv3). Default: 0.0

contents.name: kd
contents.comment: Derivative gain (Kd).  Typical Value = 1.11. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ki
contents.comment: Reset gain (Ki).  Typical Value = 0.36. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kp
contents.comment: Proportional gain (Kp).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: mwbase
contents.comment: Base for power values  (MWbase) (>0).  Unit = MW. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: pgv1
contents.comment: Output at Gv1 PU of MWbase (Pgv1). Default: 0.0

contents.name: pgv2
contents.comment: Output at Gv2 PU of MWbase (Pgv2). Default: 0.0

contents.name: pgv3
contents.comment: Output at Gv3 PU of MWbase (Pgv3). Default: 0.0

contents.name: pmax
contents.comment: Maximum Power Output (Pmax). Default: 0.0

contents.name: pmin
contents.comment: Minimum Power Output (Pmin). Default: 0.0

contents.name: reg
contents.comment: Permanent drop (Reg). Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: ta
contents.comment: Controller time constant (Ta) (>0).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tb
contents.comment: Gate servo time constant (Tb) (>0).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: treg
contents.comment: Speed detector time constant (Treg). Default: 0

contents.name: tw
contents.comment: Water inertia time constant (Tw) (>0).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: velmax
contents.comment: Maximum gate opening velocity (Velmax).  Unit = PU/sec.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: velmin
contents.comment: Maximum gate closing velocity (Velmin).  Unit = PU/sec.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
